name: Jylko: Through The Song
description:
Jylko: Through The Song is a roguelike / shooter in 2D.

You play as Jylko, who loves to listen to music.
And each time, he lets himself be guided and carried by the notes,
the chords and the instruments, which take him further and further away.

Take part in this journey through music.
Dodge and attack among more than 50 different types of enemies.
Tons and tons of projectiles to dodge.
Carefully choose your equipment to become stronger with over 120 unique items.
Prepare your expedition by Fishing, Mining, and Crafting equipment.
Defeats the bosses to go even further.

How far will you go ?
